---

Carbon Offset Registry
----------------------

Eco will be the world's first decentralized autonomous carbon offset registry. It will use smart contracts and machine learning to accurately and transparently track the creation, trade, and retirement of carbon offsets. The registry will be powered by a native token, the Eco token, which will be used to incentivize participation and secure the network.

The carbon offset market is currently fragmented and lacks transparency, making it difficult for buyers to trust the integrity of the offsets they are purchasing. Eco will solve this problem by using blockchain technology to create a single, tamper-proof record of all offsets. This will give buyers confidence that the offsets they are purchasing are genuine and will enable them to make informed decisions about their carbon footprint.

Eco will also use machine learning to monitor and verify the ongoing carbon sequestration of offset projects. This will ensure that offsets are retired in a timely manner when the carbon sequestration goals of the project have been met.

In addition to providing a secure and transparent registry, Eco will also enable the creation of new carbon offset projects through its decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) governance model. The DAO will allow anyone to propose and vote on new offset projects, ensuring that the most impactful and effective projects are funded.

The Eco token will be used to incentivize participation in the DAO and to secure the network. Token holders will be able to earn rewards for participating in the governance of the network and for providing valuable services, such as monitoring and verifying offset projects.

Eco will create a new standard for carbon offsets, making it easy for individuals and organizations to reduce their carbon footprint and make a positive impact on the environment.
